subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – The protoform is [[𤇾]]. 𤇾 is the pictogram two Intersecting torches, meaning the fire light. In Qin and Han, the crossing of torch "乂" became "冂", and "𤇾" is no longer used as independent character as third "火" (fire) was added into "𤇾". Thus, "熒" was formed.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|熒光|熒光燈|熒光筆|熒光板|熒光棒|熒光屏|熒惑|熒煌|熒熒|熒燎|熒光粉|燈燭熒煌|燈盞熒熒|熒幕廣告|熒屏|瀅熒|金碧熒煌}}
